summary: The girls of St. Trinians are on the hunt for buried treasure after discovering headmistress Miss Fritton is related to a famous pirate.
cast: Rupert Everett|Colin Firth|David Tennant|Talulah Riley|Jodie Whittaker|Juno Temple|Tamsin Egerton|Toby Jones|Sarah Harding|Zawe Ashton|Montserrat Lombard|Ella Smith|Celia Imrie|Clara Paget|Gabriella Wilde|Cloi Mckee|Holli Mckee|Gemma Arterton|Christian Brassington|Tom Riley|Georgia King|Katherine Parkinson|Pip Torrens|Steve Furst|Humphrey Ker|Ricky Wilson|Denise Stephenson|Zara Treherne|Tallulah Evans|Lola Mae Loughran|Paul Putner|Aran Bell|Freddie Fox|Angus Barnett|Giles New|David Armand|Colin Michael Carmichael|Edith Thompson|Bonnie Mallet|Paris Husty|Florence Grounds|Salah Essayah|Jessica Agombar|Harriet Bamford|Jessica Bell|Daisy Tonge|Oscar|Victoria Barker|Aimee Barrett|Douglas Bunn|Peter Paul Burrows|Olivia Savage Gollner|Jessica Henwick|Jules T-Smith|Forbes KB|Charlotte Amelia Miles|Ross Peacock|Phoebe Street
title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
